subject: Pedal sales question
description_text:
Hi,

Happy customer of the Simsonn Pro pedals. I have a question: I'm
interested in upgrading to the Pro X but as someone planning to buy an
active (brake) pedal in the coming months, I was wondering if you have any
plans of selling or if it's somehow possible to purchase just the Pro X
throttle pedal and control box (without the brake?) Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi I K,    Thank you for your love and support. You can purchase two clutch pedals and one control box via this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-prox-ultra-pedal-clutch-and-control-box

Ok, I see, but it's not possible to purchase only the throttle pedal  +
control box?

On Wed, Aug 20, 2025 at 9:52 PM service@simsonn.com
You can purchase a clutch pedal and control box, and note that you need an accelerator.

Understood. One last question: is the Simsonn Pro brake pedal (July 2024
model) compatible with this new control box?

On Wed, Aug 20, 2025 at 10:01 PM service@simsonn.com
Yes, it can use the new control box.
